title: Gold Heats Up, China’s Gold-Backed Bond Move, and the 10-Year Treasury Note’s Ominous Rise
description: In the turbulent macroeconomic landscape marked by clashes in Ukraine and Israel, and with the Fed’s Jerome Powell alluding to persistent and escalated interest rates, the 10-year Treasury note has soared to 5% — a milestone not seen since 2007. Amid this whirlwind, both gold and silver have enjoyed a surge, paralleling the ascent of […]

title: Chainlink bulls target $8; experts list LINK alternatives for consideration in October
description: While bulls predict Chainlink to break above $8, experts are looking at NuggetRush and TRON in October
